sentences.sContent: There's no rebroadcast of the soccer game tonight.
sentences.sContent_eng: There's no rebroadcast of the soccer game tonight.
sentences.sCn: 今晚没有足球赛的转播了。

sentences.sContent: The messages of the second day transmission were a rebroadcast.
sentences.sContent_eng: The messages of the second day transmission were a rebroadcast.
sentences.sCn: 这些电文通常在播出后的次日有一次重播。

sentences.sContent: Accurate progressive scanning technology, high definition image rebroadcast, reproducing ultimate beautiful pictures.
sentences.sContent_eng: Accurate progressive scanning technology, high definition image rebroadcast, reproducing ultimate beautiful pictures.
sentences.sCn: 精确逐行扫描技术，高清晰影像重播，再现至美画面。

synos.tran: [广播]重播；转播；重播（或转播）的节目
